text: It's the Same World is a 1980 American short documentary film produced by Dick Young. It was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Short. ==References== ==External links== *It's the Same World at the United Nations Audiovisual Library * Category:1980 films Category:1980 short films Category:1980 documentary films Category:American films Category:American documentary films Category:English-language films Category:Short documentary films
title: It's the Same World
